detail_desc: Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Regular fit.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft viscose jersey.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and lace-trimmed hems.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Single-breasted jacket in stretch satin with a slight sheen. Narrow notch lapels with stitching at the edges, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, a single button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Socks in a soft, rib-knit wool blend.
Shorter blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and ties at the hem. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Beret in fine-knit wool containing some nylon.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Hat in soft, fine-knit wool with a roll-edge hem.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Bolero in a loose cotton knit with 3/4-length trumpet sleeves and a ribbed edge around the opening. No fasteners.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Wide, tailored trousers in a softly draping silk blend with a high waist and an extended waistband with buttons and hook-and-eye fasteners. Zip fly, fake welt back pockets and wide legs with creases. Unlined.
Round-necked top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with print motifs. Long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Earrings made from recycled metal in the shape of a prawn and decorated with sparkly stones and artificial pearls. Length 7 cm.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sleeveless dress in lace with an opening and button at the back of the neck, gathered seam and decorative bow at the waist and a scalloped hem. Jersey lining.

Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and pair of shorts in soft, ribbed jersey. Top with a press-stud placket and long sleeves with overlocked edges at the cuffs. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets.
Slightly shorter jersey top with a print motif, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Long, flared dress in soft lace made from a cotton blend with mesh sections. Double-layered stand-up collar and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long balloon sleeves with double cuffs and covered buttons. Gathered seam over the bum for added width. V-neck underdress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Sports bra in stretch, printed cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a racer back and a wide elastic hem. Low support.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flared skirt.
Fully lined swimsuit in sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric with a cut-out section at the waist and a low-cut back with horizontal straps.

Hi-tops in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Cardigan knitted in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shawl collar, buttons down the front, side pockets, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with sequins on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with a print motif on the front and deep neckline at the back.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with notch lapels and a wrapover front with a concealed fastener. Shoulder pads, 3/4-length sleeves with slits at the cuffs, and a tie belt at the waist. Partly lined.
5-pocket baggy jeans in washed, sturdy denim with a button fly, slightly lower crotch and straight legs that taper gently to the hems.
Dress in patterned velvet with a small stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and long sleeves in airy chiffon with smocked cuffs. Unlined.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in a woven cotton blend with a ribbed collar and zip down the front. Straight cut with welt side pockets and long raglan sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs. Rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Lining and padding in recycled polyester.
Top in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with sequined details, an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly with decorative buttons.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit, T-shirt and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Wrapover bodysuit with short sleeves and press-studs at one side and the crotch. T-shirt with press-studs at the shoulders. Leggings with full feet, elastication at the heels and a foldover waist.

Lined triangle bikini top with padded cups and removable inserts. Adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back, a wide elastic trim and two frills at the hem, and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short coat in woven fabric with a zip down the front, padded shoulders, a pleat at the back and flap front pockets. Lined.
Straight-style T-shirt in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Round neckline with a wide, ribbed trim, a visible seam down the back and short slits in the sides of the hem.

Fully-fashioned, glittery hi-top trainers with a ribbed trim at the ankles and a grosgrain loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles made from partly recycled polyester. Sturdy, patterned rubber soles.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Key pocket in the waistband.

Adjustable, shimmering on-ear headphones with a padded headband and appliqués at the top. Integral volume limiter set at 85 dB to protect your child’s hearing. Suitable for mobile phones with a 3.5 mm socket. Length of wire approx. 120 cm. Not suitable for children under the age of 3.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Blouse in woven fabric with contrasting colour lace details, a small stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with inset lace trims and flounced cuffs, a concealed zip in one side, a lace-trimmed seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, worn details, a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in sturdy wool-blend twill with a zip and concealed button at the back and straight legs with sewn-in creases.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and flared hems.
Cotton canvas hi-tops with a padded edge, hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacquard-patterned socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Dress in airy, patterned chiffon with narrow shoulder straps and three tiers. Lined.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in woven fabric with cap sleeves and a V-neck with a pleat. Narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Cropped, boxy-style top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed polo neck. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
All-in-one pyjamas in patterned stretch cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with an elasticated top with a small frill trim, narrow tie-top shoulder straps and short, wide sleeves.

Fully lined, super push-up balconette bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and an elasticated hem.
Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and raw-edge frayed hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in a bouclé knit with a roll-edge neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-high boots in imitation leather with a shaft in supple imitation suede. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and smooth soles. Heel 9.5 cm.

V-neck playsuit in a crinkled weave with a wrapover front and concealed press-stud at the neckline. Opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Geometric-shaped sunglasses with thin frames and sidepieces in metal and plastic. Adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Strapless balconette bralette in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a wide fastening at the back with several pairs of hooks and eyes.
Set with six pairs of earrings and two ear cuffs. One pair of earrings is decorated with a glass sparkly stone, and another pair has a pearly plastic bead. Size from 0.4 cm to 3 cm.
Metal hair clips in various designs decorated with patterned plastic, beads and sparkly stones. Length 6.5-7.5 cm.
Fine-knit knee-high socks in a soft cotton blend.

Shirt woven in a patterned cotton and viscose blend with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in washed cotton denim with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a back pocket.
Sunglasses with plastic frames, metal sidepieces and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Card holder in grained imitation leather with a flap and button and four inner compartments. Size 1.5x7x10 cm.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.

Dungaree dress and bodysuit in organic cotton. Dress in sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and adjustable straps with press-stud fasteners. Soft brushed inside. Long-sleeved bodysuit in patterned jersey with a collar, decorative picot trims around the collar and cuffs, and press-studs at the back and crotch.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace details, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Sleeveless, fitted top in a cotton weave with a frill trim around the neckline and hem, and frill trims and pearly buttons.down the front.
